name: RabbitMQ
semantic_context: Sends messages to a RabbitMQ topic
natural_language_description: 这是 RabbitMQ 节点。主要用于: Sends messages to a RabbitMQ topic

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: sendMessage
available_options: Send a Message to RabbitMQ (值: sendMessage)

deleteMessage.displayName: Will delete an item from the queue triggered earlier in the workflow by a RabbitMQ Trigger node
deleteMessage.name: deleteMessage
deleteMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Will delete an item from the queue triggered earlier in the workflow by a RabbitMQ Trigger node

mode.name: mode
mode.description: To where data should be moved
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 作用: To where data should be moved | 默认值: queue
available_options: Queue (值: queue) - Publish data to queue
Exchange (值: exchange) - Publish data to exchange

queue.name: queue
queue.description: Name of the queue to publish to
queue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queue / Topic | 作用: Name of the queue to publish to

exchange.name: exchange
exchange.description: Name of the exchange to publish to
exchange.natural_language_description: 参数名: Exchange | 作用: Name of the exchange to publish to

exchangeType.name: exchangeType
exchangeType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Type of exchange | 默认值: fanout

routingKey.name: routingKey
routingKey.description: The routing key for the message
routingKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Routing Key | 作用: The routing key for the message

sendInputData.name: sendInputData
sendInputData.description: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON
sendInputData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Input Data | 作用: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON | 默认值: True

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to be sent

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: alternateExchange (值: None) - An exchange to send messages to if this exchange can’t route them to any queues
arguments (值: None) - Arguments to add, See here for valid options
autoDelete (值: None) - Whether the queue will be deleted when the number of consumers drops to zero
durable (值: None) - Whether the queue will survive broker restarts
exclusive (值: None) - Whether to scope the queue to the connection
